quote: It's not what I'd want for at my funeral. When I die, I just want them to plant me somewhere warm. And then when the pretty women walk over my grave I would grab their ankles, like in that movie.
quote_letters: ITS NOT WHAT ID WANT FOR AT MY FUNERAL WHEN I DIE I JUST WANT THEM TO PLANT ME SOMEWHERE WARM AND THEN WHEN THE PRETTY WOMEN WALK OVER MY GRAVE I WOULD GRAB THEIR ANKLES LIKE IN THAT MOVIE
